TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BitArray : ICloneable, System.Collections.ICollection

.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit BitArray extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class BitArray Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class BitArray sealed : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection
type BitArray = class interface ICollection interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where indicates that the bit is on (1) and indicates the bit is off (0).

span.span: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where indicates that the bit is on (1) and indicates the bit is off (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个集合类，在其中容量是始终计数相同。The class is a collection class in which the capacity is always the same as the count. 元素添加到通过增加属性; 通过降低删除元素属性。Elements are added to a by increasing the property; elements are deleted by decreasing the property. 大小由客户端控制; 索引的末尾引发。类提供了其他集合，包括允许同时使用筛选器，如修改多个元素中找不到的方法， ， ， ，和.The size of a is controlled by the client; indexing past the end of the throws an .The class provides methods that are not found in other collections, including those that allow multiple elements to be modified at once using a filter, such as , , , , and . 类是一个结构，它提供与相同的功能，但具有更快的性能。The class is a structure that provides the same functionality as , but with faster performance. 速度更快，因为它是值类型，因此在堆栈上分配，而是引用类型，因此，在堆上分配。 is faster because it is a value type and therefore allocated on the stack, whereas is a reference type and, therefore, allocated on the heap. 可以存储完全 32 位，而可以存储可变数量的位。 can store exactly 32 bits, whereas can store a variable number of bits. 位标志和小整数，从而使其适合不公开的数据对用户的存储。 stores both bit flags and small integers, thereby making it ideal for data that is not exposed to the user. 但是，如果所需的位标志的数未知，是变量，或大于 32，使用相反。However, if the number of required bit flags is unknown, is variable, or is greater than 32, use instead. 处于命名空间;处于命名空间。 is in the namespace; is in the namespace. 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化以及如何打印出其值。The following code example shows how to create and initialize a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a .

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的第一个字节表示 0 到 7 位，第二个字节表示 bits 8 到 15，以此类推。The first byte in the array represents bits 0 through 7, the second byte represents bits 8 through 15, and so on. 每个字节最高有效位表示最小索引值:" `bytes` [0] & 1" 表示位 0，" `bytes` [0] （& a) 2" 表示位 1，" `bytes` [0] & 4" 表示位 2，依次类推。The Least Significant Bit of each byte represents the lowest index value: " `bytes` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `bytes` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `bytes` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on. 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`bytes`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bytes`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第一个数`values`数组元素表示 0 到 31 位，数组中的第二个数字表示 32 到 63 位，依次类推。The number in the first `values` array element represents bits 0 through 31, the second number in the array represents bits 32 through 63, and so on. 每个整数的最高有效位表示最小索引值:" `values` [0] & 1" 表示位 0，" `values` [0] （& a) 2" 表示位 1，" `values` [0] & 4" 表示位 2，依次类推。The Least Significant Bit of each integer represents the lowest index value: " `values` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `values` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `values` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on. 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`values`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按位与运算返回`true`如果这两个操作数都是`true`，并返回`false`如果一个或两个操作数都是`false`。The bitwise AND operation returns `true` if both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if one or both operands are `false`. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个按位与运算对象。The following code example shows how to perform the bitwise AND operation between two objects. summary.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本复制仅的元素集合，不论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用都指向原始集合中的引用指向同一对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素，以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

summary.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the entire .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和返回相同的值。 and return the same value. 可以将设置为特定值，但是只读的。 can be set to a specific value, but is read-only. 如果设置一个值，是为小于、截断和索引之后的元素`value`-1 将被删除。If is set to a value that is less than , the is truncated and the elements after the index `value` -1 are deleted. 如果设置为一个值，大于，则新的元素设置为`false`。If is set to a value that is greater than , the new elements are set to `false`. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 将此属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作。Setting this property is an O(`n`) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按位或运算返回`true`如果一个或两个操作数都是`true`，并返回`false`如果这两个操作数都是`false`。The bitwise OR operation returns `true` if one or both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if both operands are `false`. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个或运算对象。The following code example shows how to perform the OR operation between two objects. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位异或运算返回`true`如果恰好一个操作数是`true`，并返回`false`如果两个操作数具有相同的布尔值。The bitwise exclusive OR operation returns `true` if exactly one operand is `true`, and returns `false` if both operands have the same Boolean value. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行两个 XOR 运算对象。The following code example shows how to perform the XOR operation between two objects.
